title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
With Colin out, Joy Taylor steps in to explain why the Cardinals need to stop messing around and pay quarterback Kyler Murray already. She pushes back against Nick Saban and other top college coaches who are spreading "fear" about Name Image & Likeness for the nation's top athletes. She also shares her predictions for the NBA playoffs. Plus, NFL veteran Darius Butler joins the show to tell Joy how the Cardinals should handle the contract situation with Kyler Murray. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
